start-partup-intro-title: Hi %s, awesome you start a part-up!
start-partup-intro-paragraph: Part-up is all about teamwork, and you are the one to kick it off! Other uppers will join your part-up if you share your goals and first thoughts on the activities. Together you make it work.
start-partup-intro-explanation: Click the orange button 'Start a part-up' to begin.
start-partup-intro-start-explanation: What is the goal of your part-up?
start-partup-intro-activities-explanatio: What are you going to do?
start-partup-intro-promote-explanation: Find uppers for your dream team!
